transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Awaz aa rahi hai sir? Hello.
Customer: Haan bilkul aa rahi hai.
Executive: Main number bole number bolenge aap apna?
Customer: Haan 7383 ek minute.
Executive: Boliye sir.
Customer: 7383
Executive: 7383
Customer: 2423
Executive: 2423
Customer: 05
Executive: 05
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Dekhiye sir maine aapko bhej diya.
Customer: Haan ye aapka number hai.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Ye number aap aap na save kar lijiye kyunki kya hai ki.
Customer: Maine save kiya hai lekin maine wo number save kiya hai aapka jo call aata hai na wo company ka number aata hai.
Executive: Achcha. Nahi usme mera number show nahi hota hai kya?
Customer: Nahi ye abhi aapka number ye ye number hai abhi aapka.
Executive: Haan aap aap na mera number waha se bhi dekh sakte ho aapke jo wo hota hai na wo profile hoti hai waha pe aapke account mein aapke account manager ka number show hota hai sir aapki profile hoti hai usme show hota hai. Achcha main dekh leta hu.
Customer: Nahi ye number save kar lunga ye number ye number aapka hi hai na?
Executive: Reference number hai tender se related.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir main isme ye dekh leta hu tender se related reference number isme kya hai.
Executive: Sir ye na Indian army ne nikala hai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Indian army ne Indian army ne nikala hai aur I think iski jo wo hai matlab details aapne aapke inke paas matlab chali gayi hai kyunki aapne us pe click kiya tha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Tender purchase aur ye aapko tender sources ye raha ministry affairs. Sir isme wo information hai jisse matlab jiske regarding jisne ye tender publish kiya hai organization data dekh rahe hain isme aap.
Executive: Indian government of ministry affairs organization name Indian army organization type defense to inke dwara nikala gaya hai sir ye tender inko requirement hai aur jab ye aapko in inke paas na aapki details pahunch gayi hogi aur ye aapko contact karenge sir thik hai.
Customer: Aisa to sir maine pehle bhi kitni baar aise tender utha liye kabhi kisi ka call nahi aaya.
Executive: Tenders sir aapne ek minute rukiye main dekhta hu aapke tenders wagera.
Executive: Isse pehle sir aapne kiska liya tha sir?
Customer: Kafi time hua. Kafi time hua.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achcha. Pichle pichle main saal ki hi baat kar raha hu main.
Executive: Main ek minute apne senior se puch ke batata hu ek minute sir ek minute.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Ek ek minute.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Kya cheez? Are wo to tender jab open karta hai tender ka detail hota hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hello. Sir ye jo aap aapke jo wo aayi hai na aapne jo ye jo photo ye aapne jo capture kiya hai aap aapne yaha blue blues mein aap ye tender source dekh rahe hain?
Customer: Ji. Hello.
Executive: Tender source sir aapko yaha se ye form bharna padega ye hashtag bid plus gem.gov show documents is pe sir aap aap click karke dekhiye gem bidding. Ji sir aap is pe click karke dekhiye isse aap matlab wo uske liye aapko form bharna padega sir.
Customer: Achcha. Open hi nahi ho raha.
Executive: Hello. Ji ji sir. Dekhiye sir try kijiye agar koi dikkat ho to sir connect kijiye please.
Customer: Nahi koi baat nahi mujhe sirf samajhna tha iska kya hai kya isse bhi koi isme kya hai main isliye puch raha tha aapse iske andar kuch bada kaam mil jaye ye cheeze aap samajh.
Executive: Nahi sir isme isme isme tenders ka matlab hi yahi hota hai ki sir wo ek to unki order quantity jyada hoti hai aap aur bhi sare tenders dekhiye aap apni profile dekhiye isme bahut sare tenders aaye hue hain. Dekhiye maine sare dekhe hain.
Customer: Hmm. Jaise crystal ball ka aaya hua hai quantity 20 pieces ki hai.
Customer: Crystal pendulum bahut sare hai.
Executive: Haan haan to inke liye aapko na matlab wo karna hota hai bit lagani padti hai ki main isko itne se itne ke beech mein aapko bana ke ya fir karke de dunga. Ye hota hai sir isme aapke jo wo hote hain competitors wo bhi participate karte hain. Wo bhi wo bhi wo bhi apply karte hain fir jiska quotation clients ko achche se samajh mein aata hai wo us usse leta hai ye hota hai sir.
Customer: Ji ji.
Customer: Samajh gaya. Ab ab samajh gaye sir?
Customer: Haan ye thik hai sir. Fir bhi kuch rahega to batao puch lunga aapko.
Executive: Thik hai sir thik hai sir puch lena koi dikkat nahi hai. Aur sir main ye keh raha tha maine aapko subah bhi profile dikhai thi sir aap thoda sa na upgrade ke liye sochte to sir behtar rehta aapki jo profile hai na wo thoda sa upgrade TrustSeal aap matlab karte to behtar rehta sir.
Customer: TrustSeal hi to hai sir.
Executive: TrustSeal oh sorry matlab dosto ki baat ki haan TrustSeal hi hai sir sorry wo dusra dekh raha tha.
Executive: To sir abhi aap TrustSeal ko kitne din se chala rahe hain?
Customer: Hello. Starting se TrustSeal hi hai mera pichle pichle saal bhi TrustSeal hi tha fir wapis TrustSeal hi liya hai maine.
Executive: Sahi hai sir nahi ka isme na isme aapko visibility wagera sir sahi milti hai matlab ye hai aur kuch nahi hai.
Customer: Pichle saal jo TrustSeal maine liya na sir to yu samajh lo pura ek saal kaam itna achcha kaam aaya aur itna achcha business hua hai.
Customer: Ah.
Executive: Sir isi wajah se maine fir se TrustSeal liya lekin abhi kuch itna maza nahi aa raha Diwali ke baad to fir.
Executive: Nahi sir aisi baat nahi hai dekho har time thik baat thik baat batau sir aapko. Haan wo har time business nahi hota hai mujhe malum hai ek do mahina aisa jata hai mujhe bhi malum hai.
Customer: Jata hai sir. Haan jata hai aisi baat nahi hai ki business nahi aisa nahi bol raha ki 12 mahine IndiaMART kaam deta hai aisa nahi hai. Hmm haan to aisi koi dikkat nahi hai sir aayega business aisi baat nahi hai.
Executive: Aur ye bol raha tha sir aapko aapko isse bhi achcha agar benefit chahiye to TrustSeal se achcha bhi ek product hai hamare paas. Usme usme kya hai pata hai maximizer mein. Haan sir.
Customer: Wo nahi wo wo achcha nahi hai. Wahi karane wala tha main. Achcha baat usi ki chal rahi thi Vivek ji se sab final bhi ho gaya tha uske liye but usme kya hua mujhe thoda wo maine abhi ye Diwali ke pehle hi maine property liya wo Aditya ji ko bhi malum hai.
Executive: Achcha koi dikkat nahi hai sir isme aisi kya badi baat ho gayi. Property liya to thoda fund ki problem aa gayi isliye maine wapas TrustSeal hi running rakha. Nahi koi dikkat nahi hai sir. Ah ye bol raha tha sir isme usme na thoda sa benefit aapki koi company ki wo wo profile wagera hai kya domain wagera company ka.
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa kuch nahi hai. Website wagera to usme sir usme malum mujhe usme usme profile domain wagera sab free aata hai usme. Haan catalog wagera aap multiple 19 templates milte hain usme leads aapko teen guna badh jati hai visibility isse TrustSeal se kafi kafi jyada badh jati hai aur kya hai ki aap abhi jaise TrustSeal ke sath to aap dekh rahe hain 20 mein ya 25 mein number pe TrustSeal ke baad aap agar maximizer pe aate hain TrustSeal to aapko mil hi jata hai fir uske sath TrustSeal to aapko TrustSeal to uske sath complimentary fir mil hi jata hai agar aap maximizer pe switch karte hain leads three times ho jati hai uske sath aapki aur calls and inquiries wo to aapki badh hi jati hai uske sath to kya hai to koi dikkat nahi sir aap ye chalaiye lekin aage next time jab bhi aaye sir upgrade kijiye yahi hai. Haan wo karna to hai wo maximizer mein. Haan haan nahi maximizer sir kya hai ki abhi jab aapne karaya October mein karaya October 24 sir ye karaya tha aapne seal one year 10 October 2024 ko karaya tha na? Haan haan 9 October 2026 ko khatam hoga aapka to koi baat nahi aap chalaiye aur uske baad sir upgrade karaiye. Thik hai abhi tak sir aapko kitne matlab conversion nikal paye hain aap isse? Abhi Diwali ke baad to kuch bhi nahi hai. Achcha isse pehle sahi chal raha tha sir. Isse pehle sahi chal raha tha. Last month tak maine last month tak maine achcha kaam kiya hai iske upar. Aisi baat nahi hai usse mil jayega business tenders mein thoda sa ye hai ki aapko na quotation kam matlab kya hai ki matlab competitors ke hisab se bahut hi kam rakhna padta hai apna price jisme aap deal karte ho jaise man ke chalo aapka jo complete wo 80 se kam rakhna padega apne product ka margin isme ye hota hai. Hmm to thik hai sir agar aapko koi dikkat ho to aap
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to understand tender details.

- Customer not getting business after Diwali.



Resolution:

- Executive explained tender process and benefits.

- Executive suggested upgrading to maximizer plan.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- tender, trustseal, maximizer, upgrade, business
